name: Ultimate Notion Travel Planner
description: Why did I create this template?As a wanderlust, I have spent countless days dreaming about the places I want to visit. I have rummaged through information, read extensively, jotted down my bucket list, and kept imagining the wondrous adventures that await me.Because of that, I built the Ultimate Notion Travel Planner. This bundle is designed to make planning your trip easy and efficient. Whether you're looking for the best places to visit, the best accommodation options, or the best activities f
features: Five linked databases to store the places you want to visit and plan your trip: Bucket List, Trips, Countries, Expenses, and Category.; Use the trip planner template to plan out your entire itinerary with one click. You can easily map out your route, research destinations, and book accommodations in a matter of minutes.; Easily monitor spending per trip with the expense statistics table.; Capture your memorable moments and experiences in Travel Tips and Journal.; Easily prepare for your trip with a packing checklist.; Bucket list; Trip planner; Budget statistic; Travel tips
